job_title: 倉務與貨物發送員【醫藥行業】
description:
Ho Tin & Associates Consulting Engineers Limited
Civil Engineering and Development Department (CEDD)
Contract No. TW/2019/01
Cycle Tracks Connecting North West New Territories with North East New Territories –
Sam Mun Tsai Extension
Ho Tin & Associates Consulting Engineers Limited has been commissioned by CEDDto administer and supervise the Contract No. TW/2019/01 for the construction of a cycle track near Sam Mun Tsai Road in Tai Po. The works started in November 2020. Applications are invited for the following resident site staff:
何田顧問工程師有限公司
土木工程拓展署
合約編號TW/2019/01
連接新界西北及新界東北之單車徑 - 三門仔伸延部分
何田顧問工程師有限公司 受土木工程拓展署委任管理及監督合約編號TW/2019/01, 於大埔近三門仔路建造單車徑。工程已於2020年11月展開。現招聘以下駐地盤人員:

Minimum Qualification & Experience required
Diploma or Higher Certificate from CIC/HKIC/IVE/TI/TC/Poly or equivalent in an appropriate discipline;
AND
At least 3 years’ relevant post qualification experience; or
At least 5 years’ relevant experience inclusive of 1 year’s relevant experience as Resident Works Supervisor or equivalent in appropriate discipline in public works projects; or
At least 3 years’ relevant experience inclusive of 1 year’s relevant experience as Resident Works Supervisor I or equivalent in appropriate discipline in public works projects.
The language proficiency requirements of Level 2 or above in Chinese Language and English Language in HKDSEE/ HKCEE or equivalent shall be met.
Applicants may also refer to the other requirement(s) of the above opening(s) stipulated in Appendix 7.4 of “Management Handbook for Direct Employment of Resident Site Staff by Consultants for Public Works Projects” from the webpage of Development Bureau.

所需基本資格及經驗:
香港建造業議會/香港建造學院/香港專業教育學院/工業學院/科技學院/香港大學/理工學院頒發的相關學科文憑或高級證書,或具備同等學歷理工;
及
具有最少三年於取得有關學歷後的相關工作經驗;或
具有最少五年相關工作經驗,其中的一年在公共工程項目中擔任駐地盤監督職位的相關工作經驗;或
具有最少三年相關工作經驗,其中的一年在公共工程項目中擔任駐地盤一級監督職位相關工作經驗。

語文能力要求具備香港中學文憑考試或香港中學會考中國語文科和英國語文科第2級成績或以上,或具備同等學歷。
申請人亦可參閱發展局網頁關於“顧問公司直接聘用駐工地人員的管理手冊”附錄7.4所載的其他同等學歷和經驗。
Conditions: Appointments will be made on Agreement Term with Ho Tin & Associates Consulting Engineers Limited in accordance with the prevailing Government’s terms and conditions. Salary will be commensurate with qualifications and experience. The incumbent may be required to work irregular hours, overtime and shifts (including Saturdays, Sundays and public holidays) to carry out supervision duties in Hong Kong, China or any designated workplace when required.
Written applications detailing personal particulars, qualifications, experiences, availability and contact telephone number should be sent to
Ho Tin & Associates Consulting Engineers Limited
Room 1201-03, Westin Centre
26 Hung To Road, Kwun Tong, Kowloon
or Email to Apply Now
(Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.)

申請者需以書面申請,並在申請文件詳述個人資料、資格、經驗、可履薪時間和個人聯絡電話號碼送交
何田顧問工程師 有限公司
香港 九龍觀塘鴻圖道 26號
威登中心 12樓1201-3室
或電郵 至 Apply Now
(申請人所提供之全部資料祇作聘請之用。)

Why Should You Join Us?

We are one of the largest dermatology specialist clinics in Hong Kong. We give you options and possibilities to the freedom to believe in what you believe.  We are a family guided by shared values and a commitment. We are a group of people with growth mindset who are always ready to tackle challenges and value the opportunities to solve complex problems. We are a passionate team who are committed to provide the highest quality possible to our clients. If this sounds exciting to you, Welcome to SkinCentral.

You have a purpose, unique talents and NOW is the time to embrace it, live it and put it to work. At SkinCentral, we value incredible people with incredible skills - but your commitment to a greater cause is something we value even more. This is the heartbeat of our organization and your time will be spent in a supportive, team environment with resources to help you flourish.

SkinCentral’s staffs are highly-valued and professional team members with an important voice in this organization. We are looking for an attentive and dedicated individual, with a fine-tuned sense of responsibility, the ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented atmosphere, and a commitment to delivering the highest quality medical and cosmetic care to our valued clients.

What You Can Bring To Us? 

Support reception operational services including client and room allocation, booking schedule, billing, and troubleshooting.
Acts as first point of contact of all customers/ visitors and image of Skincentral
Escalate issues and redirects queries to others as necessary.
Assist or maintain operation’s smooth running 
Ensure the highest levels of customer service to guests
Provide friendly, quality, and efficient service in the clinic
Assist in any ad-hoc assignment whenever necessary

We need individuals who possess the following skillsets:

Relevant job experience in a customer-focused industry
A GOOD command of English (over 70% of our clients are English speaking), Cantonese & Putonghua (written and spoken)
Strong interpersonal and communication skills 
A growth mindset to pick up new skills and knowledge quickly
Ability to work under pressure and multi-task 

SkinCentral offers our people a true opportunity to live their calling to care while experiencing the support of a comprehensive network, professional growth, trusted leadership, generous benefits and an amazing quality of life with an attractive clinic location at Central. We are proud to provide high quality service to our clients through state-of-the-art technology, clinical resources and professional expertise with a patient-centered approach that emphasizes SkinCentral's mission and commitment to quality, compassion and service.

Please visit our website: www.skincentral.com

(All applications will be treated in strict confidence and data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only)

job_title: 客戶服務主管 / 客戶服務助理 (中醫藥診所) (PR0334/20-21)
description:
三A級運作助理 (醫院保安) - (參考編號: HKEC220102)


職位空缺通告 - 港島東醫院聯網HKEC220102


職位 ： 三A級運作助理 (醫院保安)


工作地點：港島東醫院聯網 (東區尤德夫人那打素醫院 / 律敦治及鄧肇堅醫院 / 東華東院 / 黃竹坑醫院 / 舂磡角慈氏護養院 / 普通科門診)


薪酬 ： 月薪港幣14,031元至17,733元 (見備註二)


職責
(一) 履行院方保安政策及措施。
(二) 執行日常保安工作，包括巡邏醫院範圍、職員宿舍和各建築物。
(三) 監管往來及停泊在醫院範圍內的車輛及指引訪客。
(四) 提供適切的客戶服務，如解答訪客的詢問。
(五) 處理及報告未經許可而逗留醫院範圍內的人士及其他緊急事故。
(六) 維持病人排隊秩序，擔任特別護送/守衛職務，並須與院內各部門及院外機構作出配合及協調。
(七) 操作、使用及監察保安器材及停車場系統。
(八) 協助處理違例吸煙事件及工作間暴力事故。
(九) 負責火警安全、環境保護、危機處理及職安健管理。
(十) 操作及進行擬定及突發之事故應變工作。
(十一) 協助保安主任或上級編訂所有保安人員之當值更期表及安排替假。
(十二) 執行醫院管理局附例。
(十三) 預備及提交報告予院方管理層。
(十四) 執行上級指派的其他職務。


資歷
(一) 中三程度或具同等學歷 (見備註一)。
(二) 持有由香港警務處（牌照課）簽發的有效保安人員許可証。
(三) 能書寫中文及講流利粵語，閱讀及明白簡單英文。


申請者若具備以下條件可獲優先考慮
(一) 懂基本電腦操作。
(二) 持有消防大使 / 急救証書 / 工作間暴力事故証書或相關特別技能証書。
(三) 具有客戶服務經驗。
(四) 能講簡單普通話及英語。


備註


HA內部申請者
(一) 能讀寫中文及簡單英文，操流利粵語及簡單英文及具有三年醫管局保安員經驗者亦可被考慮。
(二) 合適之申請者會視乎其現在的受聘形式以合約或固定期委任形式受聘，為期一至三年，而薪酬則會根據他們現在的薪酬配套/聘用條款和現行政策而訂。

Rank       :       Executive Assistant II

Office      :      Human Resources Division / Hong Kong East Cluster

Pay          :      HK$17,888 - HK$21,743 per month 

Key Responsibilities:

Perform clerical duties following general instructions or prescribed procedures in specialized function(s) under supervision. The typical duties include:

1. Assist in day-to-day human resources operations.

2. Input data into human resources information systems.

3. Maintain human resources records.

4. Assist in preparation of management reports and / or statistical analysis.

5. Answer enquires from staff members and / or public.

6. Provide logistic support on functions, meetings and activities organized by the Human Resources Division.

7. Conduct operations in the areas of database administration and management.

8. Perform any other duties as assigned by supervisors.

Entry Requirements:

1. Completed F.5/S.5 with:

     i. Passes in 5 subjects in the HKCEE, including English Language (Syl B) and Chinese Language, or equivalent; OR

     ii. 5 subjects in the HKDSE attaining the level specified below:

Level 2 in English Language and Chinese Language; and
Level 2 in New Senior Secondary subjects / “Attained” in Applied Learning subjects (subject to a maximum of 2 subjects under this category) / Grade E in other Language subjects; or equivalent

AND diploma in a specialized function; OR

2. Completed F.5 /S.5 AND relevant diploma in a specialized function with experience.

Preferred Attributes/Exposure: 

1. Relevant working experience in human resources, in particular remuneration & benefits and/or recruitment & appointment function.

2. Knowledge in using common office equipment, MS Office applications (such as Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access and Outlook) and human resources information systems (such as ERP HCM and e-Recruitment System).

3. Good interpersonal, communication and organizational skills.

4. Ability of working independently with minimal supervision.

5.  Possession of a post-secondary educational qualification in human resources management.

Remarks: 

1. Appointment will be on contract terms for up to 3 years. 5% of total basic salary as contract-end gratuity may be offered subject to completion of contract with satisfactory performance. 

2. Retiring / retired HA staff who wish to continue working for HA after their normal retirement may also apply. If selected, the terms and conditions of employment will be offered in accordance with prevailing policies of the Retired and Rehire Mechanism of HA.

3. May be required to work in another work location to meet service needs of the HA.

4. The renewal/extension of appointment will be subject to service needs, availability of funding and job performance.

5. Please submit on-line application on or before 31 January 2022. For enquiries, please telephone 2595 5850.

Our background: CYC is a technology company formed by bike and MTB enthusiasts. We have an ambitious vision to reinvent electric bike systems. description:
職位詳情

我們位於港島/尖沙咀/荃灣市中心的地區牙科中心在各位成員的努力下快速成長，致力為居住於香港、九龍及新界的居民提供國際化的中高端家庭牙科護理服務(family-centered dental services)，使患者在人生不同階段均能夠獲得切合自身需要的全面牙科護理解決方案(integrated dental solution)。充滿愛心和關懷的團隊文化在行業內是獨一無二的。我們希望在發展業務的過程中讓每一位團隊成員都有機會衝破自己的局限，發掘大家的無限可能。

 職責 :

向病人介紹牙科知識及療程內容；完成全面的治療後跟進工作；進行獲認可的治療; 檢查工具; 或協助處理牙科中心的日常工作事務。

資歷 :

須具政府認可註册牌照及1年或以上牙齒衛生員經驗。具備良好的品格操守、友善的個性，是一個真正關心別人的人且樂於幫助別人、對工作有熱誠、性格主動。
工作表現突出的話會獲考慮出任高級牙齒衛生員或部門主管，月收入可達港幣35,000元以上，多勞多得，不設上限，旨在與同事共同分享業務發展的豐厚成果。
長遠而言，具潛質的申請人會獲中心重點培養出任集團其他高級咨詢或管理職位。

 全職優厚待遇：

除每月基本薪酬，另加每月具吸引力的現金獎勵（取決於當月的個人表現，不設上限）及年終獎勵性花紅

job_title: 診所助理 (觀塘) Clinic Assistant (Kwun Tong)
description:
Work type: Full-time
Department: Li Ka Shing Faculty of Medicine (20000)
Categories: Research Support Staff

Research Assistant I/II in the Emergency Medicine Unit of the LKS Faculty of Medicine (Ref.: 511327) (to commence as soon as possible for one year, with the possibility of renewal subject to satisfactory performance)

The Emergency Medicine Unit collaborates with emergency departments that are chronically in crisis. Every year, there are more than 2 million patient visits involving multiple types of conditions. Some of them are critically ill demanding timely recognition and interventions. Our expertise would provide scientific evidence to meet the ever-increasing challenges. We are seeking ambitious talents to join the league to make a change.

Applicants should possess a Bachelor’s degree or above in Statistics, Biostatistics, Data Analytics, Mathematics, or related disciplines. They should have a quantitative mind and excellent communication skills with colleagues and patients. Knowledge of medical statistics and competence in statistical software is essential. Experience in big data analysis would be an advantage. Those who plan to pursue research postgraduate studies are welcome to apply. Applicants with less experience may be considered for appointment as Research Assistant II.

The appointee will collect data from electronic clinical databases, such as Clinical Data Analysis and Reporting System (CDARS) and electronic patient records (ePR) for patients with post-chemotherapy fever, and emergency medicine-acute kidney injury (ED-AKI). He/She will also participate in a pilot study for incoming patients of suspected neutropenic fever after chemotherapy. Enquiries about the duties of the post should be sent to Dr. Patrick Leung at [via APPLY NOW].

The University only accepts online application for the above post. Applicants should apply online and upload an up-to-date C.V.  Review of applications will start from January 6, 2022 and continue until January 31, 2022, or until the post is filled, whichever is earlier.

Advertised:Dec 23, 2021 (HK Time)
Applications close:Jan 31, 2022 (HK Time)
